tool_description: Random mathematic examples such as addition, subtraction, multiplication and division with answer options.
name: Randomath
title: Randomath

api_list.name: Random addition
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://randomath.p.rapidapi.com/getRandomAdd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "randomath.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
